title: Labor productivity rises, impacts real GDP, PL

content.question: What would be the effect of a large increase in labor productivity on the real gross domestic product and the price level?

choices.label: Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Increase Increase
Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Increase Decrease
Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level No effect Increase
Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Decrease Increase
Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Increase Decrease

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
